org.gello.runtime
Class GelloBoolean

java.lang.Object
  org.gello.runtime.GelloBoolean

public class GelloBoolean
extends java.lang.Object

A GELLO "Boolean" value. Which has three possible values. Poor George is probably spinning in his grave. TODO: Is there a cleaner way to do this, or to implement the operations?
